ygData.subject: [EverQuest] Re: Hey there everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on Zebuxoruk: Andena Bonsante, level 26 cleric I also play on Tunare: Ceridwen, level 10 druid Kittyinathong, 9 beastlord, soon to be 10 I have had
ygData.messageBody:
I play on Zebuxoruk: Andena Bonsante, level 26 cleric

I also play on Tunare: Ceridwen, level 10 druid
Kittyinathong, 9 beastlord, soon to be 10

I have had pretty good results hunting in Blackburrow. I average about 15-20 plat per run. Of course, since I don't have to do corpse retreivals for Kitty or Ceri yet, it makes it easier to go sell: just get killed and automatically go to my starting point, lol.

One thing I have noticed, I have a lot more fun with Kitty because she's so versatile.
